Package org.icefaces.x.core.push

Provides experimental classes and interfaces related to ICEfaces' Ajax Push technology that are under development and available for community review, feedback, and contribution.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SessionRenderer The SessionRenderer class allows an application to initiate rendering asynchronously and independently of user interaction for a session or a group of sessions.
 

Package org.icefaces.x.core.push Description

Provides experimental classes and interfaces related to ICEfaces' Ajax Push technology that are under development and available for community review, feedback, and contribution.

NOTE: This package contains experimental ICEfaces classes and interfaces which are subject to change in the future. They are provided here without warranty and without an expectation of backwards compatibility with future revisions. Some of the classes and interfaces in this package may eventually be added in some form to the official ICEfaces packages and become supported, although no guarantee is made that this will occur. Classes and interfaces in these package may be substantially changed or removed at any time, without prior warning.

Package Specification

(none)

Related Documentation

The following classes are used by the org.icefaces.x.core.push classes:

  • RenderManager
  • OnDemandRenderer
